thread.title: San Diego Marriott Del Mar Entices Holiday Travelers With Savings During 48-Hour Pre- and Post-Labor Day SpecialTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: San Diego Marriott Del Mar Entices Holiday Travelers With Savings During 48-Hour Pre- and Post-Labor Day SpecialTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: San Diego Marriott Del Mar Entices Holiday Travelers With Savings During 48-Hour Pre- and Post-Labor Day SpecialTravelandtourworld.com
text:
San Diego Marriott Del Mar Entices Holiday Travelers With Savings During 48-Hour Pre- and Post-Labor Day Special Published on : Friday, August 14, 2015
Travelers who want to avoid Labor Day crowds can visit San Diego Marriott Del Mar the weekend before or weekend after the holiday.
Whether escaping with friends or making a splash with the whole family, visitors can make the most of their stay when they take advantage of the 48-Hour Pre-Labor Day Getaway Package from now until 11:59 p.m. Aug. 13, 2015. Featuring rates from just $149 a night on stays Aug. 31 through Sept. 10, 2015, this Del Mar hotel deal is the perfect opportunity for celebrating the holiday in style.
For guests unable to book during the sale, San Diego Marriott Del Mar will be offering the 48-Hour Pre-Labor Day Getaway Package one last time Aug. 18 through Aug. 20, 2015, ensuring everyone has the chance to spur some savings.
Making memories is always on the menu when fueling fun at one of the premier Del Mar hotels. Soak up the beautiful San Diego sunshine in stylish lounge chairs surrounding the sparkling outdoor pool, or opt for a shadier getaway under one of the relaxing cabanas.
Arterra invites guests to indulge in mouthwatering meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Located right on site, the Del Mar restaurant puts a new spin on culinary classics while keeping diners hydrated and happy with an award-winning wine selection. A sushi bar completes the dining experience, providing the freshest sashimi grade sushi in a chic setting.
Looking to take the fun off site? San Diego Marriott Del Mar offers easy access to a variety of notable attractions. Take the celebrations seaside at the beautiful Solana Beach, offering plenty of opportunities to surf, swim and sun bathe, or take advantage of all the shopping and dining destinations at Del Mar Downtown Historic Village. Golf lovers can perfect their swing on manicured lawns at Torrey Pines, followed by a night out in Downtown San Diego, just 20 minutes from the hotel.
To take advantage of this special Del Mar hotel deal, book reservations online using promotional code PKG.
Source: San Diego Marriott
